channel.title: Whonix is password amnesiac?
channel.description: Everytime I change my password on either workstation or gateway when I power it off and on again. It iwll revert to original default password: changeme. I've tried both virtualbox 6.1.6 and 6.1.10 and I've redownloaded and verified the ova file multiple times. What could be causing this? Thank you!
